snippet: India demanded that the Italian ambassador explain why his country is refusing to return two Italian marines to stand trial for the killing of two Indian fishermen, an official said.
abstract: India’s Supreme Court is barring Italy’s ambassador from leaving country, demanding that he explain why his country is refusing to return two Italian marines to stand trial in killing of two Indian fishermen.
lead_paragraph: India demanded that the Italian ambassador explain why his country is refusing to return two Italian marines to stand trial for the killing of two Indian fishermen, an official said.

headline.print_headline: India: Italy Envoy Barred From Leaving
